# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability
Please report security issues by opening a private security advisory on GitHub.
Do not file public issues for security vulnerabilities.

We will acknowledge receipt and provide a status update as soon as possible.

## Supported Versions
This is a small project. Only the latest version is supported.

## Disclosure
Please keep details private until a fix is available.
We appreciate responsible disclosure.

## Bug Bounty
No bug bounty program is offered.
